title: NBK successfully issues KD 150mln Tier 2 subordinated bonds
description:
NBK reaffirms its position as the largest issuer of Tier 2 securities in Kuwait

The issuance achieved the lowest reset spread ever recorded for a Tier 2 transaction in Kuwait

First Kuwaiti-dinar-denominated issuance to incorporate a 3-month par call option

title: Kuwait introduces long-term residency of up to 15 years for foreign investors
description:
Synopsis

Kuwait introduces a new residency system. Foreigners can now get permits for up to 10 or 15 years. This depends on investment value, property ownership, and family ties. The move aims to attract investors and boost economic engagement. Children of Kuwaiti citizens and property owners also ...

title: India, Kuwait sign MoU to establish Joint Commission for Cooperation
description:
External Affairs Minister (EAM) S Jaishankar and Kuwait's Foreign Minister Abdullah Ali Al Yahya signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Wednesday to establish a Joint Commission for Cooperation (JCC) at the level of foreign ministers.

title: Kuwait approves landmark digital commerce law, paving the way for a regional digital economy hub
description: Kuwait City: The Ministry of Commerce and Industry announced that the Kuwaiti Cabinet has approved the new Digital Commerce Law, marking a major milestone in developing Kuwait’s business environment and strengthening its position as a regional hub for the digital economy. title: Kuwait leads other Gulf nations in wealth as a percentage of GDP
description:
Kuwait controls more wealth as a proportion of its GDP than its regional peers, according to a new study by data platform Global SWF.

While the Gulf nation’s economy lacks the dynamism of some of its neighbors, it has amassed $1.2 trillion worth of assets across its sovereign wealth funds, central ...

title: Kuwait inflation alert: Consumer prices rise 2.39% in July 2025 amid climbing costs of essentials
description: Kuwait witnessed a 2.39% surge in its consumer price index in July 2025, according to the Central Statistical Bureau. title: Kuwait: Digital trade law aligns with global economic changes -- Min.
description: KUWAIT -- The act on regulation of the digital trade sector is compatible with Kuwait's keenness on upgrading its legislative system in a manner that keeps pace with global economic changes and boosts digital environment confidence, Minister of Commerce and Industry Khalifa Al-Ajial said on Tuesday....

title: Kuwait's Oct. trade surplus with Japan up 46.3%
description:
TOKYO -- Kuwait's trade surplus with Japan widened 46.3 percent from a year earlier to JPY 51.5 billion (USD 308 million) in October, up for the second straight month buoyed by strong exports, government data showed Friday.



Kuwait remained in black ink with Japan for 17 years and nine months, the...

title: Kuwait to replace all foreign judges with citizens by 2030 in sweeping workforce nationalization
description:
Justice Ministry commits to full Kuwaitization of judicial staff by 2030/Image: File

TL;DR:

Kuwait’s judiciary aims to be staffed entirely by citizens by 2030 as part of “Kuwaitization.”
